descriptionHtml:
A note is left at the Druken Huntsman in Whiterun. The cryptic message tells of a long forgotten cave; haunted by the writers ancient relative. Some say the cave itself tries to drive mad whoever enters.

I attempted to make Skyrim a psuedo-horror sneakfest. It\'s best if you use the realistic lighting mod to add to the enviornment and mood. If you like, rate and comment! If many people like it.. I\'ll make more!


The first part of a series of psychological dungeons. (Hopefully)


--------------------------------
I\'ve been made aware of a sound bug that causes the cave ambiance to leak into the rest of the world. I\'m currently trying to find the cause of this and will update accordingly.
-------------------------------
author: Gulpy
